topic.title: Nekojishi
topic.body: Have you played?  If so what do you think about it and who is your favorite floof?

topic.title: Still under developement
topic.body: Please be patient and bear with me as I really dont have a lot of time to work on it.  But the background image is just temporary.  And if you wish to see a diffrent one please send your suggestions to me at tyano@zeroid.bit

1510635536_1HGaLEWJz8oKkDrbhSTSEYfokZ14g.body: i plan to try to make it better with time :P but as for now have fun

1510543588_1KsguJRo4WBC2mtudEj83cTCpxVuC.body: duuuude you have to try it its really good.  Everything about it is amazing.  you can get it here https://nekojishi.tw/ or on steam if yall wanna try it

1514070653_167TLF5GGnpqGyiJDAaWidDD2VHo4.body: not that i know of, i have been looking for one too.
